scripts.build:lambda: cp index.js dist/lambda/tmp && cp -r node_modules dist/lambda/tmp && cp libs/gnugo-3.8-amazon-linux/gnugo dist/lambda/tmp && zip -r dist/lambda/goSensei-lambda.zip dist/lambda/tmp/.
scripts.build:osx: cp index.js dist/osx && cp package.json dist/osx && cp libs/gnugo-3.8-osx-10.12/gnugo dist/osx
